name: Light Their Way
description:
Created for the FiresideJam 2021

Light Their Way is a Lemmings inspired game  where you use a magic lantern to heal the land and guide the wood sprites  to the goal. I hope you enjoy it, and let me know what you think!

Controls
WASD - Move
Shift - Hide Lantern
Q - Toggle fullscreen cam
E - Advance Dialogue
